ygData.subject: Re: Paw of Opalla and Desperate request for aid.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not NO DROP so I believe you can trade it.  I m told that someone sold one for 4000pp on Erolissi Marr but I can t confirm that story. ... I camped
ygData.messageBody:
Sirensa Qi'Seraph wrote:
>
> From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
>
> I was under the impression that the paw of opalla was no trade - therefore
> not really "a dime a dozen" And I would never begrudge another cleric a
> good item. The rings are NOT no trade - so it IS possible to purchase
> them - though they are excessively costly to get from another player.

It's not NO DROP so I believe you can trade it. I'm told that someone
sold one for 4000pp on Erolissi Marr but I can't confirm that story.

> And at your level, killing Mitty should give you good experience, so get a
> group and hunt her, you don't have to rely on smite alone if you have a
> group - everyone in the group could get experience, thus no one would mind
> overly helping you to camp. (Druids seems to like the paw also - you can
> get a druid to help you camp and help you to kill Mitty - and get both of
> you the rings)

I camped there for 30 hours total to get the ring, most of that time I
was with one of the following: lvl 35 cleric, lvl 24 druid, lvl 20
druid. I also got other druids/clerics popping in to see if she was
camped. So it is possible to group (but will lengthen your total camp
time considerably if the others are after rings too)

What I did to help disuade KSing was to give any extra rings I got to
another kerra that I wasn't going to kill. That way if someone came
along that needed the copper or silver rings I offered them them in
return for looting rights on the first gold ring. Then just told them
which kitty to kill. That worked nicely for me. Just remember to give
the kitty your ring then loot Mitty to get a replacement since you can't
carry two at once (being LORE).

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr
